# Global

# Methods

# formatDate(Date d, String pattern)

Format date to string

  • Props:
    • d- Date
    • pattern- String
  • Returns: String

# group(List<Document> documents, List<Region> regions, Boolean ascending=null, Number pageNumber=1, Boolean fromLast=false)

Merge/Group documents into one based upon text within region on particular page defined by pageNumber of each document

  • Props:
    • documents- List<Document>
    • regions- List<Region>
    • ascending- Boolean, defaults to "null"
    • pageNumber- Number, defaults to "1"
    • fromLast- Boolean, defaults to "false"
  • Returns: List<Document>

# load(String path, String password="")

Load document from path

  • Props:
    • path- String
    • password- String, defaults to """"
  • Returns: Document

# loadCSV(String path, Boolean withHeader=true, String seperator=")

Load CSV document

  • Props:
    • path- String
    • withHeader- Boolean, defaults to "true"
    • seperator- String, defaults to """
  • Returns: any

# loadFile(String path, Boolean isBinary=false, Boolean asLines=true)

Load file

  • Props:
    • path- String
    • isBinary- Boolean, defaults to "false"
      in binary/text format
    • asLines- Boolean, defaults to "true"
      in
  • Returns: any

# loadFont(String fontPath, Boolean embedded=true)

Load font from path

  • Props:
    • fontPath- String
    • embedded- Boolean, defaults to "true"
      default true
  • Returns: Font

# loadImage(String imagePath)

Load image from path

  • Props:
    • imagePath- String
  • Returns: Image

# loadJSON(String path)

Load JSON document

  • Props:
    • path- String
  • Returns: any

# merge(List | Map | Document | String documents)

Merge documents into one

  • Props:
    • documents- List | Map | Document | String
  • Returns: Document

# now()

Current date

  • Returns: Date

# output(Document | List<Document> | Map<String, Document> | Map<String, List<Document>> document, String fileName=null)

Output document to file path

  • Props:
    • document- Document | List<Document> | Map<String, Document> | Map<String, List<Document>>
      Can be of type Document or List<Document> or Map<String, Document>
    • fileName- String, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: void

# outputCSV(List<Map<String, String>> data, String fileName=null)

Output data in CSV format

  • Props:
    • data- List<Map<String, String>>
    • fileName- String, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: void

# outputFile(String | List<String> | byte[] data, String fileName=null)

Output file

  • Props:
    • data- String | List<String> | byte[]
    • fileName- String, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: void

# outputFont(Font font)

Output font

  • Props:
    • font- Font
  • Returns: void

# outputImage(Image | List<Image> image, String imageName=null)

Output image to file path

  • Props:
    • image- Image | List<Image>
    • imageName- String, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: void

# outputJSON(def data, String fileName=null)

Output data in JSON format

  • Props:
    • data- any
    • fileName- String, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: void

# parseDate(String dateStr, String pattern)

Parse date

  • Props:
    • dateStr- String
    • pattern- String
  • Returns: Date

# partition(List<Document> documents, Map<String, Predicate<Document>> cond, Boolean exclusive=true)

Partition/Index documents into various document streams based upon condition such as same text.. within particular page of each document

  • Props:
    • documents- List<Document>
    • cond- Map<String, Predicate<Document>>
    • exclusive- Boolean, defaults to "true"
  • Returns: Map<String, List<Document>>

# sort(List<Document> documents, List<Region> regions, Boolean ascending=true, Number pageNumber=1, Boolean fromLast=false)

Sort the list of document based upon text within region on particular page defined by pageNumber of each document

  • Props:
    • documents- List<Document>
    • regions- List<Region>
    • ascending- Boolean, defaults to "true"
    • pageNumber- Number, defaults to "1"
    • fromLast- Boolean, defaults to "false"
  • Returns: List<Document>
